alert.note: Alert for Big Island South; Big Island Southeast; Kipahulu; Lanai Leeward; Lanai South; Lanai Windward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Central Valley South; Molokai Leeward South; Molokai North; Molokai Southeast; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; South Haleakala; South Maui, Upcountry; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued November 30 at 1:13PM HST until December 01 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FOR ALL HAWAIIAN ISLANDS THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Maui, Molokai, Lanai, Kahoolawe, and the Big Island. * WHEN...Through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Flood prone roads and other low lying areas may be closed due to elevated runoff and overflowing streams. Urban areas may receive more significant flooding and property damage due to rapid runoff. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - A kona low west of the islands will keep a moist and unstable air mass over the islands through Friday. This will result in the potential for flash flooding and thunderstorms.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
